purpleculture_pinyin:
lún
to sink (into ruin, oblivion); to be reduced to
тонуть (в гибель, забвение); быть сведенным к
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 沦)
Pictophonetic: 侖 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
淪陷 [ lún xiàn ]: to fall into enemy hands; to be occupied; to degenerate; to submerge
淪落 [ lún luò ]: to degenerate; impoverished; to fall (into poverty); to be reduced (to begging)
淪喪 [ lún sàng ]: to be lost; to be ruined; to perish; to wither away
淪亡 [ lún wáng ]: (of a country) to perish; to be annexed; subjugation (to a foreign power)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 侖 [ lún ] logical reasons, logical order
heisig_chinese_memo: The comic book stand was poorly constructed and sinks into the ground after massive amounts of water from the typhoon.
Ru_trainchinese: lún: (графема) тонуть, погружаться, снижаться, исчезать
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The pool water is like a sink to the lifeguard. He can get around it in seconds.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration:> Inscriptions from " water " from " Lun ", " Lun " is also a sound character, " perish " refers to the original meaning of the word has a wave texture, "said the text": "perish, wavelet to perish from the water, the sound Lun. ".

" Perish " from the word " Lun was sound" to " Lun " is the phonetic word more methodical analysis of the meaning, so " perish " is intended to have a word of wave texture. See " lun ".

The word " Lun " is not seen in the oracle bone inscriptions. The word " Lun " in the bronze inscriptions is only used as a person's name, like Bai Si's father Pan Yun: "Bai Si's father is like Ji Lunmei (pan)", which means that the artifact is Bai Si Father's escort for Ji Lun to marry.

The word " Lun " is mostly used as the original meaning in handed down classics, such as "The Book of Songs. Wei Feng. "Fatan": "The river is clear and degenerate." "Mao Zhuan": "Small geomantic omen is written, turning like a wheel." It is also borrowed to express the meaning of sinking, falling, and perishing, as in "Guang Ya. "Explanation": "Legend, stains also." "Book. "Weizi": "Today Yin is lost, and if you wade through the water, there is no end to it."
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions from " shui " to " lun ", " lun " is also a sound symbol, the original meaning of water waves with texture.
humanum_full_description:
>金文從「水」從「侖」，「侖」亦是聲符，「淪」字本義指有紋理的水波，《說文》：「淪，小波爲淪。从水，侖聲」。

　　「淪」字從「侖」得聲，以「侖」為聲符的字多有條理分析之意，所以「淪」字本意為有紋理的水波。參見「侖」。

　　甲骨文未見「淪」字，金文中「淪」字只用作人名，如白駟父盤云：「白駟父乍(作)姬淪媵般（盤）」，即指該器物是白駟父為姬淪所做的陪送出嫁的盤。

　　「淪」字在傳世典籍中多用作本義，如《詩經．魏風．伐檀》：「河水清且淪猗。」《毛傳》：「小風水成文，轉如輪也」。另也借來表示沉淪、淪陷、淪亡等意，如《廣雅．釋詁》：「淪，漬也。」《書．微子》：「今殷其淪喪，若涉大水，其無津涯。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「水」從「侖」，「侖」亦是聲符，本義指有紋理的水波。

淪喪 [ lún sàng ]: to be lost; to be ruined; to perish; to wither away
淪亡 [ lún wáng ]: (of a country) to perish; to be annexed; subjugation (to a foreign power)

>金文從「 水 」從「 侖 」，「 侖 」亦是聲符，「 淪 」字本義指有紋理的水波，《說文》：「淪，小波爲淪。从水，侖聲」。 「 淪 」字從「 侖 」得聲，以「 侖 」為聲符的字多有條理分析之意，所以「 淪 」字本意為有紋理的水波。參見「 侖 」。 甲骨文未見「 淪 」字，金文中「 淪 」字只用作人名，如白駟父盤云：「白駟父乍(作)姬淪媵般（盤）」，即指該器物是白駟父為姬淪所做的陪送出嫁的盤。 「 淪 」字在傳世典籍中多用作本義，如《詩經．魏風．伐檀》：「河水清且淪猗。」《毛傳》：「小風水成文，轉如輪也」。另也借來表示沉淪、淪陷、淪亡等意，如《廣雅．釋詁》：「淪，漬也。」《書．微子》：「今殷其淪喪，若涉大水，其無津涯。」

". " Perish" from the word " Lun was sound" to " Lun" is the phonetic word more methodical analysis of the meaning, so " perish" is intended to have a word of wave texture. See " lun". The word " Lun" is not seen in the oracle bone inscriptions. The word " Lun" in the bronze inscriptions is only used as a person's name, like Bai Si's father Pan Yun: "Bai Si's father is like Ji Lunmei (pan)", which means that the artifact is Bai Si Father's escort for Ji Lun to marry. The word " Lun" is mostly used as the original meaning in handed down classics, such as "The Book of Songs. Wei Feng. "Fatan": "The river is clear and degenerate." "Mao Zhuan": "Small geomantic omen is written, turning like a wheel." It is also borrowed to express the meaning of sinking, falling, and perishing, as in "Guang Ya. "Explanation": "Legend, stains also." "Book. "Weizi": "Today Yin is lost, and if you wade through the water, there is no end to it."

淪字的基本解释

淪
lún
见“沦”。

淪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lún］
［《廣韻》力迍切，平諄，來。］
“沦1”的繁体字。
(1)水的小波纹。亦谓水起小波纹，或使起波纹。
(2)相率。
(3)陷入；沉沦。
(4)亡失。
(5)降落；坠落。
(6)进入；渗入。
(7)古水名。
[②]［lǔn］
［《集韻》魯本切，上混，來。］
“沦2”的繁体字。
见“混淪”。
[③]［guān］
［《集韻》姑頑切，平山，見。］
“沦3”的繁体字。
复姓用字。

淪字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淪； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页631第06
【唐韻】力迍切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】龍春切，?音倫。【說文】水波也。【爾雅·釋水】小波爲淪。【詩·魏風】河水淸且淪猗。【傳】小風拂水成文，轉如輪也。【韓詩外傳】順流而風曰淪。淪，文貌。　又【爾雅·釋言】淪，率也。【詩·小雅】淪胥以鋪。【箋】言牽率相引，而徧得罪。　又【博雅】淪，沒也。【書·微子】今殷其淪喪。　又【集韻】縷尹切，音稐。盧困切，音論。義?同。　又鱗淪，水相次貌。【馬融·長笛賦】波瀾鱗淪。　又垽淪，水迴旋貌。【郭璞·江賦】垽淪溛瀤。　又濆淪，水勢相糾貌。【木華·海賦】?濆淪而滀漯。　又混淪，未分離之貌。【列子·天瑞篇】氣形質具而未相離，故曰混淪。　又水名。【山海經】宣山，淪水出焉。　又【集韻】姑頑切，音鰥。姓也。古有泠淪氏。　又魯本切，㤻上聲。混淪，水流轉貌。　又【韻補】叶閭員切，音連。【道藏歌】今日度元吉，憶曾狀曲泉。萬神同斯和，億劫豈知淪。

金文小篆楷体

暂无。

(3) Fall into; sink.
(4) Lost.
(5) Landing; falling.
(6) Enter; infiltrate.
(7) Ancient water names.
